testing_tools: OWASP ZAP; Burp Suite; Snyk; CodeQL
test_scenarios: ["Broken Authentication","Session Hijacking","Credential Stuffing","MFA Bypass Attempts","Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR)"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero critical or high vulnerabilities identified in automated scans (REQ-1-078). All findings from manual pen tests must be remediated before release.
remediation_sla: Critical: 24 hours; High: 7 days; Medium: 30 days.
reporting_requirements: Vulnerability reports integrated into Jira; Executive summary for releases.
trend_analysis: Track Mean Time to Remediate (MTTR) for vulnerabilities.
